meanings.definition: The breaking down of tissue by enzymes.
meanings.sent1: Histolyses can occur when enzymes break down tissue in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study histolyses to understand how enzymes affect tissue breakdown.
meanings.sent3: The histolyses of the cake by the hungry kids was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: The histolyses of trust between them was slow but inevitable.
meanings.sent5: The histolyses of the paper in water showed the power of enzymes in action.

meanings.sent1: Histolyses is a natural process that occurs in nature.
meanings.sent2: During histolyses, tissue breaks down into smaller components.
meanings.sent3: The histolyses of the leaves in the compost bin was a smelly affair.
meanings.sent4: The histolyses of the old building revealed its history layer by layer.
meanings.sent5: The histolyses of the ice sculpture under the sun was a slow and beautiful transformation.
